page.description: Adds a new record to a table bound to the layout.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.NEW_RECORD() method adds a new record to the table bound to a layout. This is equivalent to using the <TBL>.ENTER_BEGIN() and <TBL>.ENTER_END() methods.
